==== Printers ====

The new Cups printer server dialogue brings relative ease to setting up a printer.

'''Test to try'''

** Plug in your printer and attach it to your pc.
** Your printer if supported should automatically be setup for you.  Print a test page.
** If you have a printer on another machine, enable '''Show printer shared by other systems'''.  Hit apply and refresh.
** See if it is detected and setup correctly try a test page.
